ai-mil7.8.6:1.1_0: “Are you able to alone three things that should be cultivated?”
ai-mil7.8.6:1.2_0: “Great king, the work of all living beings!
ai-mil7.8.6:1.3_0: In the same way, a cow who goes on all sides from the village.
ai-mil7.8.6:1.4_0: This is the first kind of food.
ai-mil7.8.6:2.2_0: In the same way, a gentleman who grows in good conduct grows no merit.
ai-mil7.8.6:2.3_0: This is the second kind of food.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.1_0: Furthermore, a long time now I’ve reached all states of food.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.2_0: In the same way, a village in the whole world beast by a long time.
ai-mil7.8.6:3.4_0: When you have spoken, great king, you should train like this:
ai-mil7.8.6:4.3_0: You should be attained by those who are attached,
ai-mil7.8.6:4.4_0: who gives out the whole world.’”
ai-mil7.8.6:5.1_0: The sixth staple food is finished.
